name: Jewel Sniping Tool
description:
A tool to record Jewel melding sets in Monster Hunter World.

Make sure to back up your save. 

Meld as many times as you want recording what you get here. Use the drop downs to select what jewels you get and the check mark button to put them into the list. If there is something you really want click on the set that has it to highlight the set.

Once you are finished reload your backed up save. 

Figure out where you are in the 1-1-2 pattern.

Once you know where you are in the pattern used the 1 and 2 buttons next to the list to remove sets that you have by passed.

The S button will save the current list. the C button will clear the saved List.

for More information on Jewel Sniping please check out 

https://www.reddit.com/r/MonsterHunter/comments/7zqifh/melder_decoration_sniping...
